General.Name: Loyakk Vega
General.Description:
The Loyakk Vega is a decentralized business relationship platform that will leverage the blockchain technology to provide a secure and efficient exchange of critical data and value within business networks. The platform embeds a proprietary patent-pending blockchain technology and advanced enterprise relationship management capabilities enabling to feature a full stack solution to ease the early and evolving blockchain use cases across industries, to support the firm's vision, and provide a roadmap for enterprise-wide blockchain implementation and digital transformation.

Loyakk Vega token (LYK) is an ERC-20 token that will work as the access token to the platform services.

Telegram: https://t.me/loyakk

ICO.Description:
The Loyakk Vega is a decentralized business relationship platform that will leverage the blockchain technology to provide a secure and efficient exchange of critical data and value within business networks. The platform embeds a proprietary patent-pending blockchain technology and advanced enterprise relationship management capabilities enabling to feature a full stack solution to ease the early and evolving blockchain use cases across industries, to support the firm's vision, and provide a roadmap for enterprise-wide blockchain implementation and digital transformation.

Loyakk Vega token (LYK) is an ERC-20 token that will work as the access token to the platform services.

Telegram: https://t.me/loyakk

Team:

  • Salim Ali: CEO.
  • Jitu Telang: CTO.
  • Tsvetan Georgiev: Development Lead.
  • Jimjees Abraham: Blockchain Solutions Architect. 
  • Jaijiv Prabhakaran: Chief Architect. 
  • Marzanne DeLoof: Customer Success. 
  • Rakesh Sreekumar: Chief Marketing Officer. 
  • Sadiq Quasim: Director, Loyakk Ltd. 

Loyakk Vega will be holding its ICO on March 5, 2018. The Presale is from Feb 20, 2018 to March 4, 2018. The ICO token supply represents 30% of the total token supply and will be available for 0.5 GBP each during the offering. The total supply for individual token purchasers will be 60m tokens. The ICO funding target or hard cap is 30,000,000 GBP. The ICO will end on the 30th of March, 2018 or when the funding cap is reached.

Token Reserve Split (70%):

  • 5% Partners;
  • 7% Incentives;
  • 10% Blockchain Research Fund;
  • 17% Team & Advisors;
  • 31% Pre-Sale;

Loyakk Vega ICO will feature a bounty campaign and a bonus program, and the token will not be mineable.
